meanings.definition: Styled or arranged (hair) in an elaborate or elegant manner.
meanings.sent1: She coiffured her hair for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The hairstylist coiffured her hair beautifully for the wedding.
meanings.sent3: He coiffured his hair so well that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was coiffured like a crown fit for a queen.
meanings.sent5: The way she coiffured her hair made it the talk of the town.

meanings.sent1: She admired her coiffured hair in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: The actress appeared on the red carpet with a coiffured look.
meanings.sent3: His coiffured hairstyle made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The coiffured hair added an air of sophistication to her appearance.
meanings.sent5: The coiffured hairstyle perfectly complemented her outfit.
